channel.title: NameQuick Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.9.25
item.description:
NameQuick v1.9.25

What’s Fixed

OpenAI API Key Validation

Fixed an issue where OpenAI API keys would fail to validate in the app, even though they were working correctly. The validation process now works reliably, even on slower internet connections.

What’s Improved

Better Reliability for BYOK Users

• API key validation now works on all network conditions, including slow or unstable connections • Large file uploads are more reliable with improved timeout handling • All AI providers (OpenAI, Gemini) now have consistent behavior

Performance Enhancements

• Faster API key validation by removing unnecessary retry attempts • More efficient code structure for better app performance • Improved error messages to help diagnose any issues
